about.title: About Cemcon Group Pvt. Ltd.
about.body:
A captive unit of the Indian Railways, Cemcon group is a manufacturer and supplier of railway components. Been established in 1991, Cemcon group has emerged as a leading group of companies dealing in/with railway rubber parts,fabricated components, manufacturers, exporters, wholesalers and suppliers.

Approved by Research Design & Standard Organisation, Lucknow (India), we are steadily manufacturing and supplying the mechanical & track safety products to Indian Railways.
